content.raw:
Jenkins is still expecting test results for this:

~~~
Unable to find test results for UNIT_ign_TEST.xml, test did not run. Expected results in D:/Jenkins/workspace/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/ws/ign-transport/build/test_results/UNIT_ign_TEST.xml
~~~

Maybe we should disable them in the cmake level?
content.html:
Jenkins is still expecting test results for this:

Unable to find test results for UNIT_ign_TEST.xml, test did not run. Expected results in D:/Jenkins/workspace/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/ws/ign-transport/build/test_results/UNIT_ign_TEST.xml

Maybe we should disable them in the cmake level?

content.raw:
This failed on Ubuntu on Jenkins, but it also failed 5 builds ago, so I'll add it to #103 as a flaky test

~~~
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/ign-transport/src/ign_TEST.cc:100
Value of: topicFound
  Actual: false
Expected: true
~~~
content.html:
This failed on Ubuntu on Jenkins, but it also failed 5 builds ago, so I'll add it to #103 as a flaky test

/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/ign-transport/src/ign_TEST.cc:100
Value of: topicFound
  Actual: false
Expected: true
Ticketed #104

content.raw: Should we skip the test for windows and ticket an issue then?
content.html: Should we skip the test for windows and ticket an issue then?

content.raw: I see the `ign` test suite failing on Windows. This is probably unrelated but as far as I know we haven't put the effort to support `ign` on Windows yet, so we shouldn’t test it.
content.html: I see the ign test suite failing on Windows. This is probably unrelated but as far as I know we haven't put the effort to support ign on Windows yet, so we shouldn’t test it.
